HomeKit kompaniyamiz 2019-yilda tashkil: Our company, HomeKit, was founded in 2019 and first started operating under the name «HomeKit» in Uzbekistan. Our services include the following types:
HomeKit aqlli pardalari bilan hayot yana: With HomeKit smart curtains, life becomes even more enjoyable. Control the curtains at any time with just the phone in your hand.
Smart qulflar orqali kirish kodi bilan e: Lock and unlock doors with access codes via smart locks. Easily create and send access credentials for keyless entry for friends, family, and guests.
Maishiy texnika, vaqt kalitlari va o'lch: Control the power consumption of household appliances, timers, and measuring instruments remotely and prevent accidents due to device failures with HomeKit.
Hisoblagichlar, rozetkalar kabi aqlli qu: Manage energy savings in the apartment through smart devices like meters and sockets, and use our remote and regular electrical equipment to prevent electricity waste.
Aqlli kameralar obyektivni, kamerani, bo: With smart cameras, adjusting the view sensor is easy, even if you don't know image processing or programming! The initial user interfaces allow for quick integration with any viewing system and enable real-time interaction with the system.
2019-yilda Toshkent shahrida o’z faoliya: It started its operations in Tashkent in 2019. Our team, operating under the name “HomeKit,” aimed to serve as a bridge for the people of Uzbekistan to smart homes and to always offer the best solutions for them. In the last 3 years, we have satisfied more than 50 clients and successfully completed projects.
Biz mahsulotlarimizni Xitoy, Buyuk Brita: We import our products from China, the United Kingdom, the USA, Canada, and Europe. Our partners include Toshkent City, Mirobod, Akay City, and others.
Toshkent shahar va butun respublika bo'y: Throughout Tashkent city and the entire republic
Agar siz isitish tizimining haroratini o: If you want to raise the temperature of your heating system, lower the temperature of your air conditioning, turn on the water heater while away from home, or turn everything off while lying in bed, do it with a single tap on your mobile phone via HomeKit.
Aqlli uy mahsulotlari bilan siz energiya: With smart home products, you can ensure that you won't waste energy. When machines, devices, and equipment have smart home products, they can be immediately controlled and turned off after use.
Agar siz texnologiyani yaxshi bilmaydiga: Even if you are not familiar with technology, you can easily understand how things work by following guides. With smart home technologies, you can feel connected to your home 24/7, even when you are not there.
Eshiklarni qulflash va ochish HomeKit bi: Locking and unlocking doors is easier with HomeKit.
Xavfsiz uylar har qanday uyning eng muhi: Safe homes are the most important aspect of any home. No matter how many locks you use for your home, there is always a risk of burglars breaking in. Protect your home smartly with HomeKit smart technologies.
Oqish datchiklari soni (simli), o'rnatil: Number of leak detectors (wired), number of installed leak detectors (wired), number of leak detectors (wireless), number of water shut-off valves, number of water inlets
Tashqi kameralar soni, ichki kameralar s: Number of external cameras, number of internal cameras
Televizorni boshqarish, Ko'p xonali zona: TV control, Multi-zone (stereo) systems, Home theaters (5.1, 7.1), Wi-Fi points, Control panels
Yerdan isitish zonalari, Radiatorlar gur: Underfloor heating zones, Radiator groups, Room thermostats (with/without display), Air conditioning system with feedback, Air conditioning system without IQ connection, Ventilation system with feedback, Exhaust fans
Bizning operatorlarimiz sizga tez orada: Our operators will respond to you shortly.
Avtomatlashtirilgan mikroiqlim tizimi va: An automated microclimate system and lighting scenario control for each room in your smart home significantly reduce energy costs.
Istalgan vaqtda smartfoningizda videokuz: You can view surveillance cameras on your smartphone and check the condition of your home at any time.
Favqulodda vaziyatlar haqida masofaviy x: You can receive remote notifications about emergencies both inside the house and in nearby areas through the automated system.
Tizim sizni gaz portlashlari va yong'inl: The system protects you from gas leaks and fires.
Endi uy kinoteatringizni boshqarish oson: Now managing your home theater is simple and easy – with one button press, you can activate the desired scenario.
Suv, gazning oqishi, konditsionerning no: Water leaks, gas leaks, or improper functioning of the air conditioner – the automation system will alert you about everything.
Faqat bitta tugmani bosish bilan yorug'l: With just one button press, the lights dim, the curtains close, and the microclimate is balanced.
Yorqin xonalar, yorug'lik oqimlari, inte: Bright rooms, streams of light positively highlight the interior – your friends will feel comfortable and relaxed in your home.
Siz uxlayotganingizda, yorug'likni teksh: While you sleep, you don’t need to check the lights or walk around the rooms. With a single press of the bedside switch, you turn off all the lights in the house and enjoy a restful sleep.
